headline: Jim Cramer Says Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies is a “Really Good Company”
summary: Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies Corporation (NYSE:WAB) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer shed light on. A caller asked for Cramer’s thoughts on the company, and in response, he said, “You know, believe it or not, I’ve actually done a lot of work on this one, and it won’t quit. Every time I think […]
